title: Didn't Get a token for S- game on zigg
body: I thought i would get a lv 6 token for ziggs for S-,  i have lv6 zigg mastery and that game should have gave me my second ziggs lv6 token but it didn't

replies.body: If you have level 6 mastery on Ziggs why do you need level 6 tokens shouldn’t you want level 7 tokens. Which require S/S+

> [{quoted}](name=MysticLlamaZ,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=7w6de0E2,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-04-28T23:34:27.856+0000)
>
> If you have level 6 mastery on Ziggs why do you need level 6 tokens shouldn’t you want level 7 tokens. Which require S/S+

^
